component.name: UsernameEntry
component.script:
function init() print "Creating StandardKeyboardDialog"
' m.top.width = 1800 m.top.title = "Login to Your Channel" m.top.message = ["Please enter your email address:"] m.top.buttons = ["OK"] m.top.keyboardDomain = "email"
m.top.textEditBox.hintText = "email_addr@example.com"
m.top.observeFieldScoped("buttonSelected", "dismissDialog") 'm.top.observeFieldScoped("text", "textChanged")

sub wasClosedChanged() print "Example StandardKeyboardDialog Closed" end sub

sub dismissDialog() m.top.close = true m.top.username = m.top.text end sub
